name: Deep Sea Sport-Fishing Charters
description:
Experience the finest Deep Sea Sport-fishing Adventure that is offered, originating in the Montego Bay area. We have the most experienced, well trained to operate in the tourism industry and certified team of sport-fishermen who knows the tropical waters very well. We offer the safest and best customer service in the Water Sports business.

We ensure that all the equipment are used in a safe manner and only in designated areas. Fish the Cayman Trench off the beaches of the world famous Montego Bay, Jamaica. We offer both Trolling or Bottom Fishing (drop line).Catch Marlin, Tuna, Dolphin (mahi mahi), Wahoo, Kingfish, Sailfish.
